visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Temperature Variation'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include two series named 'Series 1' and 'Series 2', each with monthly temperature data. The chart should also have custom colors for the series and additional configurations such as chart margins, background, and a legend with specific layout and positioning.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Temperature Variation'. The chart includes two data series named 'Series 1' and 'Series 2', each representing monthly temperature data. The x-axis is labeled with month names, and the y-axis is labeled with 'Temperature (°C)'. Both axes have styled labels with specific colors and font sizes. The chart also includes a legend with a vertical layout, floating to the left, and positioned at specific coordinates. Custom colors are applied to each series for better differentiation. Additional configurations such as chart margins and background color are set to enhance the visual appeal and readability of the chart.
